query:
-- Create onboarding_processes table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `onboarding_processes` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `candidate_id` int NOT NULL,
  `employee_id` varchar(100),
  `start_date` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `expected_end_date` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `actual_end_date` timestamp,
  `status` enum('not_started', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'on_hold') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'not_started',
  `progress` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `assigned_to` varchar(255),
  `notes` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `onboarding_processes_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

-- Create onboarding_documents table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `onboarding_documents` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `process_id` int NOT NULL,
  `task_id` int,
  `document_type` enum('contract', 'nda', 'policy', 'handbook', 'form', 'other') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `file_url` varchar(500),
  `template_id` int,
  `requires_signature` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `signature_status` enum('pending', 'signed', 'rejected'),
  `signed_at` timestamp,
  `signed_by` varchar(255),
  `signature_url` varchar(500),
  `expires_at` timestamp,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `onboarding_documents_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

-- Create talent_analytics table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `talent_analytics` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `candidate_id` int NOT NULL,
  `success_score` int NOT NULL,
  `retention_probability` int NOT NULL,
  `performance_forecast` enum('low', 'medium', 'high', 'excellent') NOT NULL,
  `cultural_fit_score` int NOT NULL,
  `technical_fit_score` int NOT NULL,
  `growth_potential` int NOT NULL,
  `risk_factors` text,
  `strength_factors` text,
  `recommendations` text,
  `confidence_level` int NOT NULL,
  `analysis_date` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `talent_analytics_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

-- Create hiring_predictions table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hiring_predictions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `candidate_id` int NOT NULL,
  `job_id` int,
  `prediction_type` enum('success', 'retention', 'performance', 'culture_fit') NOT NULL,
  `predicted_value` int NOT NULL,
  `confidence` int NOT NULL,
  `factors` text NOT NULL,
  `historical_comparison` text,
  `recommendations` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `hiring_predictions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

-- Create talent_analytics table

  `candidate_id` int NOT NULL,
